body_html:
@albertz @qlzh727 Just did some cleanup and reverted a fair number of no-longer-necessary changes. Only major remaining tasks I think are documentation, formatting and maybe some extra testing. You can use sequence_gather_scatter_indices to go from unsorted sequence lengths to indices. You can then gather_nd and scatter_nd to use that sequence with variable length CudnnLSTM.

Does anyone know more about V2? I'm not sure what tests should be added for that specifically. There is also this comment in the code:

# TODO(jamesqin): switch default value to "1" on May 25th 2018, and get rid
  # of V1 ops.

You can use sequence_gather_scatter_indices to go from unsorted sequence lengths to indices. You can then gather_nd and scatter_nd to use that sequence with variable length CudnnLSTM.
Does anyone know more about V2? I'm not sure what tests should be added for that specifically. There is also this comment in the code:
# TODO(jamesqin): switch default value to "1" on May 25th 2018, and get rid
  # of V1 ops.
body:
@albertz @qlzh727 Just did some cleanup and reverted a fair number of no-longer-necessary changes. Only major remaining tasks I think are documentation, formatting and maybe some extra testing. You can use `sequence_gather_scatter_indices` to go from unsorted sequence lengths to indices. You can then `gather_nd` and `scatter_nd` to use that sequence with variable length `CudnnLSTM`.

Does anyone know more about `V2`? I'm not sure what tests should be added for that specifically. There is also this comment in the code:
```
# TODO(jamesqin): switch default value to "1" on May 25th 2018, and get rid
  # of V1 ops. 
```
